resources.string: APPLICATION OVERVIEW: Loopify is a simplified music streaming application created as part of a university project. Inspired by popular platforms, it provides core music streaming functionalities, including browsing, searching, and detailed information on artists and albums.

MAIN FEATURES: Loopify enables smooth music streaming with Firebase Storage integration, comprehensive artist and album information from The AudioDB and Last.FM APIs, and a user-friendly interface inspired by popular music platforms. Users can easily search for artists, albums, or tracks and enjoy responsive media playback controls, including play, pause, and stop functionality.
OUR GOAL: Loopify aims to provide a seamless and accessible music streaming experience, combining educational and professional goals to enhance users\' enjoyment and engagement with music.
